spec_data.Name: gnome-shell-extension-auto-move-windows
spec_data.Description:
This GNOME Shell extension enables easy workspace management. A specific
workspace can be assigned to each application as soon as it creates a window, in
a manner configurable with a GSettings key.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 02 Nov 2017 02:59:27 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Assign specific workspaces to applications in GNOME Shell
